name: BusinessBuffetBite
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The business buffet is a discussion of issues entrepreneurs face in business. Ed Bejarana & Phil Anderson each have over 30 years of business experience and have helped thousands of business people grow their businesses.
Listen to the Business Buffet podcast where ever you get your podcasts or visit www.businessbuffet.page.Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
